column1: full and dead accurate on middle and off, pushed back
gets some shape away from a set of stumps outside off, left alone
good swing away but too wide to make him play
there, gets the outside edge with subtle movement, Liton's half-heartedly pushing at it and it drops short of slip
angled into the pads this time, tucked to midwicket
good length on off, blocked. An accurate first over to start off
full, curves in and goes to the on side off the inside edge as he pushes at it
shout for lbw, Dharmasena says no. Going down leg, mostly. Perhaps pitched outside as well as Imrul closed the face looking for a flick
nicely fires it full around the fourth or fifth-stump line, nice tight leave from Imrul
full, slanted across at 124.7ks, jams the bat down and the ball straightens to beat the inside edge
full, pushed across outside off, defended
great leave again, trusts the angle which is pretty close to off and is sure of his off-stump

has he got a feather there? Kettleborough is late to raise his finger but Liton reviews. Short of a length, just a slight movement away from him, Liton jabs at it and there's clear daylight as ball passes the outside edge
nips into him from a length, flicked behind square for the first runs of the morning
drifts away in the air and seams further away after landing, called a wide
full and accurate on off, pushed to mid-on
length, holding its line, left alone outside off
full outside off, leans forward and crunches a drive to the right of point
Lovely lengths and channel. In the corridor, on a length, and straightening after getting him to poke at it. narrowly beats the edge.
pushes at a fuller one and gets an inside edge onto the pad
good length, left alone in the corridor outside off
length on off, taps it to point
fuller of a length, leaves him late, Imrul shoulders arms
fuller still and pushed further across, another easy leave
leans forward into a drive, this time it's closer to off and he inside-edges to the pad
length, slanted across, left alone
shapes away from a length, content to let it go
length, straightens around the fifth-stump line, left alone
extra bounce from a length, angled in, cuts him in half and pings him high on the front thigh
switches back to outside off and Liton lets it go
short, sits up outside off, mistimed pull through square leg
full outside off, pushed through point
sprayed down leg, gets a tickle, or has he? Nope, four byes down to fine leg
fuller length on off, crunched to mid-off
short of a length, cuts into him, solid backfoot defence
short of a length, too far outside off, no shot offered
full on middle, driven to mid-off
short outside off, arches back and swats at it but misses
good length on off, blocked to point
back of a length outside off, drops it down the pitch
ah, pushes it across his off-stump and Imrul is drawn into it, pushes away from the body and gets beaten

this is some beautiful bowling. He slanted the previous one across. This time it's just short of a good length, straightens down the middle and off channel. Imrul unsuspectingly has the bat hanging outside off, gets an inside edge to the keeper, who snaffles it brilliantly diving to his right
shortish, climbs across his off-stump, swats at it and gets beaten
full outside off, driven to cover
fuller length on middle, blocked
back of a length, comes on straight outside off, left alone
short and wide, cut to point
short of a length on off, glorious backfoot punch through the covers
angles in a length ball, tucked to the short fine region
good length on middle, shuffles across and blocks
short, a bit of width, cut to point
shuffles across and blocks a length ball
left alone outside off
length, angled into off, defended
chipped to midwicket. This is loose play. Inviting delivery, angled into the pads, and Liton gets carried away, goes with hard hands and doesn't bother to keep it down
clips a fuller one off the pads to midwicket
starts off with a short and wide delivery that's slapped away past the left of gully.Uppish but safe
angles a fuller one across and it's left alone
full, pushed too far across, left alone. He's taken the bails out at his end
full, angled across, crunched to mid-off
tries to flick this fuller one but plays all around it and cops it on the pad. Pitched outside leg
fuller of a length, a bit of shape away, left alone
fullish length outside off, strides out and blocks to point
fuller, angled across, straightens late but wide enough to be left alone
full, angled across on middle, clipped off the pads through midwicket. poor delivery, gets the due treatment
shuffles across to a length ball and blocks off the inside of the bat into the leg side
slants across a length ball that's left alone
length on off, back hand comes off as he defends down the pitch
shuffles across and drills it down the pitch

that's some terrible shot. On a first morning. With his team two down. A forgettable shot on debut. Reaches out to a very wide delivery, had no business playing at it, reaches out and jams the bat into the ground even as the ball flies to second slip off the outside edge
cuts back in really sharply off a length, risky, risky leave as the ball narrowly goes past off
barely gets the bat down as he pushes this to cover for a quick one
slants across a length ball, too far across to make him play
short of good length, loads of extra bounce as he shuffles across and stabs to point
full, angled across off, defended down the pitch
full, tails in late from outside off, left alone
good length, angled into off, blocked
short of good length, blocks to cover from the crease
swings away from pretty wide outside off, left alone
full, angled into off, pushed towards mid-off
angles in really sharply and finds the inside edge as he gets forward to defend
he's dislodged a bail, so it's a no-ball. back of a length angling slightly across, he tried to work it away without timing
angled across and left well alone
tries to stroke it through the off-side but only gets as far as cover
full ball, pushed down the ground and they get a well-judged single
length ball outside off, lets it go through

ooh, that's coming back in fairly sharply. On a length and moves in off the seam. He came forward and shouldered arms, but probably didn't expect the ball to come back in so sharply. Safe though, with ball touching neither pads nor stumps
outside off, and he's not interested in coming anywhere near that one
keeps it straight on a length, and Mominul punches from the crease towards cover
leading edge that rolls away to mid-off. Loose from Mominul, tried to flick a full ball away but was lucky the leading edge didn't carry

dropped! back of a length and Mominul tried to slash it away. Brian Chari at point stretched to his left with the ball going well above head height. Got both hands but the ball popped out. Not an easy chance, but could have been taken perhaps, given Zimbabwe's high fielding standards
full ball, driven gently back to the bowler
defended again
too wide of off, and he has no trouble watching it go
stays inside the line and lets it go through
full ball outside off, getting some shape away on the ball. He thought for a millisecond about playing it, but pulled out
left alone outside off
smarly bowled. He kept it going away and outside off, brings this one back in. But the batsman is equal to the task and defends from the crease
driven off the front foot, but straight to extra cover
loose ball and punished. Given room outside off and at a half-volley length, Mushfiqur square drives it through cover-point. Not timed perfectly so the ball doesn't run to the fence
length ball on the stumps, defended to cover
lets it go outside off
pushed to mid-off
shows a full, straight bat to defend it back to the bowler
angling well across and he watches it go through harmlessly
full on the stumps, comes on the front foot and wrists it to mid-on
he's getting some bounce still. On a length outside off, and it takes off appreciably on the way to the keeper
keeps it fuller and on the stumps, the batsman gets a thick inside edge that goes to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, he transferred weight back well to cut it. Got on top if it that time, but straight to point
short on the leg stump, but doesn't rise as high, and he pulls it to deep square leg from below chest-high
length ball on offstump, defended to point
full ball on the stumps, confidently defended off the front foot
defended to cover
defended off the front foot
keeps it full, steered to point
great line, in the corridor and on a good lengthy. Good leave by Mominul, who knew where his off stump was
back of a length, defended
slash and miss back of a length outside off. He went for it, but connected only with air
lovely line. Leg-cutter that pitches on a perfect spot and moves a touch away, past the outside edge
just short of slip that line has drawn the poke again, and the edge falls in front of Brendan Taylor at second slip, rolls away for a couple
keeps it straight and full, moving in a touch, rolls to mid-on off the pad
attacking the stumps again, keeps it full and straight, defended with an angled bat from the crease
full ball, defended
a bit fuller, which allows him to squirt it away through point.
defended off the front foot
back of a length on leg stump, rising up, patted back down
beautiful shot too full, and he takes a confident stride out. the bat meets the ball coming down in a perfect cover-driving arc, and the ball purrs to the extra cover fence
steered to point
very full and driven back past the bowler. Didn't get the timing quite right, off the inside half of the bat, but good enough to get three
full ball, driven back
short ball, bounces up  and strikes him on the helmet. Tried to go for the pull, but was beaten to it. That must have jarred
patted back
short again, but doesn't rise as high. Pulled to deep square leg, but didn't time that too well. Off the bottom half of the bat
length ball, moving away a touch, left alone
back of a length outside off, cuts it, but gully tumbles to his right and stops the ball
nice line, in the corridor, but Mushfiqur is confident enough to leave it well alone
full on the stumps, defended gently into the off side
another bumper. Rises high up and he defends it from in front of his face almost
angling across, and moving further away, beats his forward prod
full ball, driven back to the bowler off the inside half of the bat
now one keeps low. Outside off and left alone, but it died before reaching the keeper
too short to start off, pulled away with force, but there is a deep square leg
tossed up, but ends up as a full toss. Struck nicely, straight back past the bowler and into the fence
too short, outside off. Cut away, but straight to point
fuller that time, clipped to mid-on and they run through for a quick single
very full again, comes forward and drives him inside out through the covers
nice dip on that one, tossed it up outside off. He went for the drive again, but could only inside edge it towards square leg
steered to point
fuller on leg stump, clipped to mid-on
nice line again, keeping in the channel and nipping back in. Left alone, which was good judgement by the batsman as well
full on off, defended into the off side
back of a length, coming into him, cuts it to point
on a length outside off, shoulders arms
too short outside off and turning away, he rocks back and slaps it through cover

beautifully bowled We're going upstairs to check for the stumping. But he's dragged his foot back over the line. Flighted outside off, drew him into the drive, then it dipped and turned away. Quick work by the keeper, especially with extra bounce, but he hadn't dragged his foot too much outside the crease, so could come back.
full ball, stroked towards cover, and that will be lunch
he starts with a full ball on leg stump that's confidently clipped through midwicket for a brace
better line from the Zimbabwean medium pacer, and Mushfiqur lets an outswinger past him outside off
fuller this time, but once again there's some away shape, and Mushfiqur raises his hands high to leave as the ball scoots through outside off
he follows that up with an offcutter, and Mushfiqur is equal to it, defending from the crease
nice and tight on off stump from Tiripano. Mushfiqur is half forward and covers the swing well to defend
a solid first over after lunch from Tiripano is completed with another length ball, on or around off stump, that Mushfiqur meets with a defensive bat
play and miss outside off! Some turn from Raza, but not much bounce, and Mominul is beaten on the cut. In fact, replays show there was an edge on this one, so this is a dropped chance
pushed back down the track
punched into the covers
tapped into the off side again, soft hands from Mominul
nothing soft about this as he thumps a drove to mid on, but it's aimed straight at the fielder
that's a shocker from Raza, who lobs this down very short and well outside off. It was so short, Mominul had to wait and wait on the cut, and get right across, and he nails it past point
Mushfiqur digs a very full ball out, back down the track
shaping in to the pads, and it's glanced into the leg side, straight to midwicket
Mushfiqur isn't quite as far forward as he should be to meet this full one shaping in from outside off, and the ball squirts off the inside half of the bat into the leg side
outswinger this time from Tiripano, and it's not close enough to draw a shot from Mushfiqur
on a length, just outside off, and Mushfiqur opens the face on a forward push to get the ball to point
whipped off the hip, and Mushfiqur collects a single to fine leg to keep the strike
sharp turn! Mushfiqur gets right back to cut this, and has to jab down quickly to keep it out
turned into the leg side for one
Mominul lunges well forward and nudges a drive through point
width outside off, and Mushfiqur hammers a square drive out to the cover boundary
Tiripano continues to hit that length just outside off, and Mushfiqur opts not to play at this one.
Tiripano plugs away on that nagging length, but his line means Mushfiqur can leave this alone
well, after a couple of tight deliveries Tiripano aims for a surprise yorker, but it slips out too full down the leg side and is easily glanced for one
nicely controlled by Mominul. Tiripano doesn't have the pace to hurry him with the short one, and Mominul rolls his wrists well to thump a pull to midwicket
another bouncer, but shorter this time and with a little more oomph. Mominul ducks to let this one go
drifting down the leg side, and a ricochet off the pad brings up the fifty partnership
aggression! Mominul dances down the track and drills a drive at mid on
driven a little more conservatively this time, to cover
too short from Raza, and Mominul camps on the back foot to cut into the deep. There's a fielder out on the boundary to keep them to one
landing on a length and spinning in to Mushfiqur from around the wicket, and it's defended to leg
looped up a touch fuller, and Mushfiqur defends
swept hard out to long leg! Raza offered up a hit-me ball full on leg stump, and Mushfiqur bent low to hammer the sweep out through the gap behind square
short outside off, and Mominul slashes a cut to Mavuta at point, who gets a hand to it to stop the boundary
much better length from Tiripano, just outside off and quite full. Mominul has a good look and leaves it alone
floated up very full on off stump, almost a yorker, and Mominul digs it out into the leg side for one
Tiripano finds that tight line on off stump again, and Mushfiqur stays deep in the crease to defend
too short, and Mushfiqur gets back and across to pull down to the man at fine leg
on a length, right on off stump, and Mominul meets it with a nicely vertical defensive bat
cracked past point! Jarvis starts with a loosener outside off, and Mushfiqur places his cut perfectly behind square
offcutter from Jarvis, and Mushfiqur covers the bounce and movement well to defend
that's a tight leave! Mushfiqur clearly knows where his off stump is, and this wasn't far away
another leave, but this one is a touch wider and he's in no danger at all
another cut! This time in front of square. Mavuta hares after it and manages to haul the ball in just inside the rope
Jarvis offers width outside off, and Mominul chops one past gully
Williams starts full on leg stump, and Mominul whips to leg
close! This one came on with the arm, taking the inside edge of Mushfiqur's bat
Mushfiqur gets right back, deep into his crease to cut to point
a flat-batted square drive is stopping in the covers, but not quickly enough to cut off the single
firmly punched down the ground, and as long on cuts it off they amble through for one
Mushfiqur clears his front leg as his eyes light up at a full ball outside off, but a firm drive is well stopped at cover
Jarvis hits a good length on off stump and Mominul defends to cover, on the bounce
a little shorter from Jarvis, and Mominul steps back to pull in front of square
Jarvis errs in line, and Mushfiqur glides a single to fine leg
a much better line from Jarvis, and Mominul gets behind it to defend to cover
elegantly driven by Mominul, who steps well forward and right to the pitch to drive through extra cover
Mominul stays deep in his crease to cut the ball, but his shot finds point
Mushfiqur flicks to leg as Williams slings one too far towards leg stump
beaten on the cut! This was flatter and faster from Williams, and it beat Mominul's shot
Zimbabwe's lines have been a little all over the place since lunch, and Williams gifts two more runs with one that's spinning down the leg side and helped on its way
and width outside off now. Mominul doesn't miss out this time, and he brings up a superb, fighting fifty with a scything cut
Williams comes round the wicket now, and Mominul taps a length ball softly down the track
swept hard, but straight out to the fielder at long leg
very full and right on off stump. Mominul is forward to defend
pulled out into the deep! Nothing wild about the shot though, it's well controlled and Mominul collects three more

big appeal! Jarvis jags one in to Mushfiqur's pads, and shouts an lbw appeal. But was there an inside edge? Zimbabwe decide not to review, and replays show that the ball did indeed take the inside edge on the way onto the pad
pushes a fuller one back
defended down the pitch
jams the bat down in time to dig a yorker out
slants a full one across on middle, clipped to backward square
short, a bit of spin away, shifts back and blocks towards point
pitched up on off, drilled to mid-off who is slightly back
full, slanted across off, pushes with one hand behind point after reaching out
darts one in towards off, backs away and manages to cut it behind point
length, slanted into middle and leg, blocked from the crease
reaches out to a fuller one and carves it towards point
reaches out to a fuller one and pushes to deep point
brings the bat down to a fuller one and gets an outside edge through third man
length ball outside off, blocks to point with an open face and is sent back after he looks to steal a single
full and straight outside off, moves across and blocks towards mid-off
drifts in the air and cuts into him to grab the inside edge and hit the pad
full, slanted across off, driven down the ground to long-on
pitched up on off, driven carefully off the front foot to the left of the bowler
back of a length on middle, blocked to mid-on off the crease
leg side sllder, tries to tuck but can't put it away
curves into the pads, clipped to square leg
full, leg-stump line, swept to square leg
clips a fuller one off the pads to midwicket
full outside off, leans in and drives through cover
slaps a fuller one to the right of sweeper cover, 100 of the partnership
fires a full toss as he gives it too much flight and whips it to deep midwicket
full, flighted and dipping, dug out back to the bowler
full on middle, driven to sweeper cover
driven down to long-off
dipping full toss from round the wicket, whipped to deep square leg
backs away and punches to point
length, spinning away, defended to point
leans into a gentle drive between cover and point, brings up his fifty
nudges a fuller one past short leg
pushes a fuller one to mid-on
short, loses his line badly and sprays it down leg, can't make contact with a wild attempt at a pull
strides across and drives a fuller one to the left of point
full, slanted across off, too easy for Mominul who leans forward into a drive through the gap at extra cover
full toss, dipping on him, gets down and sweeps behind square
pitched up on middle, driven through to the left of sweeper cover
length, pitching outside leg and spinning in a bit, lets it hit the pad as he offers no shot
full, pushed across off, defended off the front foot
full on middle, gets forward and blocks
gets down and sweeps to short fine
short ball, mistimes a pull to the midwicket region
pushes it too far across outside off and Mominul slaps through cover
tries to hang back and play late but the ball goes through after beating the edge
flat, back of a length, hangs back and punches between cover and point
full and flighted outside off, defended back
short, wide, waits and cuts through backward point. Top shot
full on middle, defended
full on middle, defended
stays back and turns this away to the on side
back of a length, straightening on middle, nudged to short leg
full outside off, slapped to deep cover
short, wide, cut to cover
back of a length, pushed across off, punched off the backfoot to the right of point
gets down and sweeps behind square
full on leg, gets down and sweeps to fine leg
shuffles across and defends in front of off
full outside off, defended to mid-off
short of a length, shuffles across and blocks to point
full outside off, gets forward and blocks
full, sliding down leg, makes no contact on the sweep as it skips down to short fine
short, tries to pull but it's too far away down leg and he misses
shuffles across to a length ball on middle and nudges it to short leg
full, pushed through on middle, clipped wide of long-on
short, straightening on off, rocks back and cuts through point
length, floated across off, shuffles and blocks
goes on with the arm outside off, moves across and defends back
floated up on leg, clipped to midwicket
too much flight, a low full toss, clipped away to deep midwicket
big turn outside off, left alone
backs away and tries to cut, makes no contact
short of a length, straightens outside off, rocks back and hammers a pull through midwicket
four more.. short and wide, capitalises as it spins away by freeing up and lacing a cut through cover
pitched up on middle, driven back
tucked off a length to the right of midwicket
full, pushed across off, gets forward and blocks
full, slanted across off, clipped to midwicket
full, sliding into leg, turned away to short leg
floated up outside off, slashes away from the body and creams it uppishly through point. Sweeper runs across and mops up in front of the boundary
very full on leg stump, drilled down the ground
sweeps a leg-side fuller ball to deep backward square leg
full on off, driven to cover
slaps a wide fuller ball to sweeper cover
full, pushed across off, gets forward and blocks
short and spinning away, backs away and cuts behind point
short and wide, cut to point
pitched up on leg, defended down the pitch
too much width again, laces a cut to deep point
short, spins in, pulled to deep midwicket
straying on the pads and comfortably worked away to square leg
a bit short, and he stands tall to punch, but can;t pierce the cordon
too short again, and he rocks back to slap it powerfully past point
better length now, brings him forward to defend with a straight bat
stays back to tuck it off his hips down to square leg, playing with the turn
some drift there, and Mushfiqur closed his bat face a tad early, was trying to work it away

fantastic century for Mominul, 7th in Test cricket trying to give it air, the ball ends up as a full toss. Mominul took it on the full and whipped it to the midwicket boundary. Much needed ton for both him and the team.
stays back to punch it off the back foot to cover
punched off the back foot again through cover, but threads the gap this time through the in-field
too short, he stays back and gets down low to pull it through midwicket
tossed up, gently pushed into the off-side and they go through for a quick single because there is no fielder close in
full outside off, driven to cover
watches it go through outside off
presents a straight defensive bat to this, just fuller of a good length ball.
too short now, and Mominul has been quick to pounce on those. Gets on top of it and cuts it to deep point
back of a length on off, pushed to short cover
very full, tailing into the stumps, clumped off his toes to mid-on
good length on off, given some air. defended towards point
connects with the slog-sweep tossed up invitingly, he went down on one knee and connected superbly, sending it rocketing to the midwicket fence
comes on the front foot and flicks it to midwicket this time
given some air, he comes forward to defend
stays back and pats this into the legside
tossed up and he comes down the track to meet it, but only drives it to mid-off
angles a length ball in, tucked away to square leg
short of a length, angled across, shuffles across and blocks
ah, streaky! Pushes across and slashes well away from the body. Loses control over the shot and it flies to point who leaps and arches back but doesn't manage to get a hand to it
tucks a length ball to midwicket
full and straight outside off, left alone
left alone outside off again
fuller balls, tails back in from a leg stump channel and skips down the leg side
good length, angled across off, left alone
full outside off, doesn't bother reaching out for it
good length, narrowly angled across off, but he's sure of the angle and lets it go
short of good length, walks across and casually sticks the bat out, inside-edged to the boot
again, inside-edged.. done in by lack of pace this time, a 121.1kmph length ball that he gets too close to
full outside off, gets forward and defends
full, tails in late from outside off, left alone
full, a lot straighter this time, left alone
full, moves away subtly, worked to point
short of good length, pushed across off, shuffles across and blocks to point
back of a length, pitching outside leg, defended down the pitch
left alone outside off
gets his line closer to off stump, but not close enough. Mushfiqur still able to shoulder arms easily
getting to shape away, but from well outside off. Batsmen can leave those all day long
keeps it in the corridor that time, but Mushfiqur is resolute in not being drawn into a poke. Still getting some movement, is Jarvis
fuller and on the stumps, pushed gently into the off-side. He wanted a single but rightly sent back
very full and on the stumps again, blocked with the full face of the bat
keeps it full and in the channel. Batsman lets it go
gets it straighter and a touch moving back into the left-hander. Mominul stands tall and steers to gully
coming into the batsman again from round the wicket, there is still movement on the deck. This one came back in sharply and beat Mominul's attempted flick to hit him on the thigh pad
fuller ball, driven to mid-off
keeps it in the channel but very full, driven to cover
back of a length outside off and the probing lines have drawn an impatient shot. Tried to slash that one, but didn't connect. It was too close to cut
sticks to the same corridor, with the ball moving away. Mushfiqur has resisted the temptation to lay bat on ball on those so far
back of a length outside off, steered to point
ooh, gets that to move the other way. Good length again, great probing line and it comes back in this time. But bounces well over the stumps
back of a length outside off, that one didn't bounce much, Mushfiqur stayed low to cut it to deep point
getting some shape again, but very full. Mominul drives it off the toe end back past the bowler
nipping back in a touch again from a length, squirted towards gully off the outside edge
back of a length outside off, pushed to cover
finds the probing line, but Mominul is confident enough to leave it and not be drawn into a shot
very full that time, almost a half-volley, but Mominul misses out, not transferring weight quickly enough on the drive, that rolls to mid-off
back of a length, goes on the back foot and defends
good ball, good leave. Right in the corridor, and coming back in but he lets it go close to his body
in the air, but safe slices this attempted drive and it balloons up over point. The fielder there was only at the fence, so the ball lands safely in between
back of a length, and he stays back trying to tuck it fine. Gets an inside edge onto pad
angling across, back of a length and defended to mid-off
stays back and defends, the ball rolls towards midwicket off a thickish inside edge
length ball slanting slightly across, blocked back
keeps it on a good length and angling slightly across again, defended from off stump
length ball outside off, pushed to point
strays on the legs, and he works it away off his hips. Went uppishly but no fielder was anywhere near
length ball on off, defended solidly
short ball, and Mushfiqur is on to it quickly. Stays back and swivel-pulls it with great timing. Deep square leg puts in a dive, but can't save the boundary
outside off on a length, lets it go through
back of a length gets a bit big on him, but nicely guided down to deep point off an open face
in the corridor outside off, Mushfiqur does as he has to that line all through - shoulders arms
getting some shape away from the batsman, but keeps it on the outside off line. Batsman leaves
on a length and much straighter, nipping back in a touch. He's equal to it though, and pushes it past point for a single
angled across, stays a bit low, slapped down to a squarish third man
well outside off and Mushfiqur lets it be
past the outside edge straightaway gets nice drift on it and beats his intended drive, and turns in a smidgeon, but not enough to hit the stumps

dropped by the keeper gets the edge this time, but the keeper doesn't react in time and the ball goes through. Got him coming forward and driving again, but the ball brushes the edge, brushes the keeper's gloves and runs down to the fence
pushed to cover
in the channel outside off, lets it go
back of a length on off, patted down to gully. Refuses the single straight away
takes toll of the loose delivery Pitched up and he strides out to meet it and send it crashing through the covers for four. That's also the 200-run stand
strays on the pads now, and clipped to mid-on
back of a length on off, pushed to mid-off
very full and driven crisply, but short cover gets a hand to it to stop it going further
clobbered tossed up on off stump, he gets down and unfurls a slog-sweep that sends the ball rocketing to deep midwicket

extra bounce this time but Mushfiqur was up to it and cuts it towards backward point. No run though
fuller on stumps, turned away towards square leg
tossed up around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller and pushed towards square leg for a quick single
spins away from a back of a length, Mushfiq drops it into the off side off the backfoot
similar length, a more leg sidish line, pulled behind square
slanted across off, crunched through the covers
reaches out to a fuller one and drives to the sweeper at cover
gets forward and blocks a fuller one to cover
floats up a full toss across off, Mushfiq creams it to sweeper cover
pitched up outside off, leans into a drive to long-off
full outside off, blocked
length ball, spinning into off, defended
short of a length outside off, crunches a backfoot punch to mid-on
lets this fuller one spin into his pads and works it away to midwicket
drills a fuller one down to long-on. Moves to 199 and keeps the strike
gets forward, sees it spin away and widely shoulders arms
back of a length, waits for it to do its thing and then carefully blocks to point
defended off the backfoot as it spins away and takes the outside of the bat
waits and steers this with the turn late but finds point
forcefully sweeps a fuller ball that thuds into forward short leg. The wait continues
waits at the crease and defends a length ball into the off side. Mavuta denies him the double with a maiden
full, around off, defended on the front foot
length ball that spins into off, opens the face for a dab to third man. Mushfiqur insists on the second
advances down the ground and swings wildly from outside off to deposit it over long-on. That's fifty for Mehidy. Bet no one knew that he was nearing a landmark of his own
another charge down the track and another wild swing. Doesn't get hold of it quite as it rolls through to deep midwicket

and there it is, the double. Pulls a short ball to square leg and takes off and barely makes the crease as the throw arrives. Spreads the arms wide and punches the air to soak in a richly-deserved ovation. Terrific innings
length, spinning in, nudged to short leg
length ball that spins down the leg side
creams a fuller one to point
pitched up outside off, thumped straight down the ground forcefully
short, pitching outside leg, pulled to deep backward square
floated up outside off, creamed to extra cover
full on leg stump, pushed to mid-on
short, wide, opens the face through backward point
spins in from a length, nudged away to backward square
turns away a fuller one with the turn to deep midwicket
short and spinning in, cut through point
advances and drives down to long-off
short of length, spinning in, punched down to long-on. 500 up
defended from the crease
full on leg stump, defended
swings wildly for a slog from outside off, gets a bottom edge that trickles through to the fine leg region
pushes a fuller one to point
gets down to slog but it's pretty wide outside off and he misses
defended down the pitch
back of a length, straightens outside off, beaten
pushed back to the bowler
slider on middle, defended
length on off, blocked
swept from a leg side line past backward square leg
full, coming into him around middle and leg, slogged wide of long-on
pushed into cover
clipped down to long-on
swept behind square for one
full on leg stump, pushed to mid-on
reverse-swept to third man
another reverse sweep, this time over the backward point region for four
clips a fuller one behind square for one
length outside off, pushed through point
short, spinning away, pulled to deep backward square
clips a fuller one to backward square
fuller ball, Masakadza closes the face but there's sharp swing into the right-hander, pings the pad but heading down leg
short of a length, angled across off and holding its line this time, left alone
and this one moves back in again. Finds the pad and Bangladesh want a review. Pitching in line and hitting the outside of leg stump, so umpire's call stands firm
short of good length on middle, shifts back and solidly defends
slashes at a wide fuller ball, sends a thick edge flying through backward point. But why would a batsman in his right mind play that shot when the team's trailing by over 500 runs?
length ball angling across, pushes forward but extra bounce takes the shoulder of the bat and rolls past gully
short ball, fired into the middle and leg channel, ducked under
this one's short as well but horribly directed. Down the leg side.. and Mushfiqur, double ton and all, flings himself to his left for a one-handed grab
short again, easily gets under it as it goes over middle and leg
this one angles away sharply from a back of a length, another wayward delivery
that's a nice channel. Along the sixth-stump line and shaping away from a length, left alone
shortish, 130ks outside off, left alone as it seams away
nicely bowled. Fired full and angled across in the corridor, left well alone
extremely full outside off, jams the bat down and squeezes it out towards point
just back of a length, swung across his off-stump left alone
full, angled across, left alone
angled in from around the wicket,  trusts the angle and lets it go
short ball, angled in from outside off, keeps those wrists down and lets it go
back of length outside off, dabs it towards covers
short of length, aiming at the batsman's throat, defended from the back foot
length ball, around sixth stump, left alone
dropped at second slip. Length ball, forces an outside edge. Second slip fielder dives across towards his left and spills the chance. Ariful the fielder there
length outside off, pushed towards covers
length ball, around middle and leg, tucked away towards short midwicket
length outside off, left alone
length outside off and shouldered arms once again
beauty! Pitches on a length outside off, forcing the batsman to play at it before leaving him at the very last moment, no outside edge though
in the corridor this time and left alone by Chari
length ball, on the stumps, kept slightly low as Chari defends it in front of his pads
bouncer this time but outside off, Chari ducks and sways away from it
length outside off, left alone
length ball, once again in the corridor, left alone
length ball, around sixth stump, comes forward and lets it go once more
another similar delivery, he needs to bowl much closer to the batsman to get any response
short of length, around rib cage, tucked away behind square
fuller, just outside off, pushed towards covers for a single
fuller outside off, leans into the drive and opens the face at the last moment to send it past the point fielder, who chases it all the way to keep it to two
length ball, on middle and leg and punched towards midwicket for two more
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length outside off, draws Chari forward and beats the outside edge once again
length outside off, comes forward before shouldering arms
length outside off, some extra bounce this time, hitting the shoulder of the bat as the batsman looks to defend
fuller outside off, driven towards mid-off
length around off, defended from the back foot
length again, just outside off, played gently towards point
fuller, just around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps and Masakadza goes for the slog sweep, down on one knee and gets a four to square leg
length outside off, punched off the back foot towards the bowler's right
length outside off, comes forward and defends
length ball, coming back in with the angle, defended from the crease this time
fuller outside off, a big stride forward to drive it to the extra-cover fielder
length ball, around off, comes forward and defends
length again, angling across the right-hander who comes on the front foot and blocks again
another play and a miss, just shortens his length this time, the batsman pushes at it and gets beaten
length outside off, punched off the back foot but the silly mid-off comes in the way
length again, on the stumps and punched towards mid-on this time
fuller, around middle and leg, defended on the off side
another back foot punch, but straight to the cover fielder this time
a thick outside edge as Masakadza looks to defend this length ball, the ball rolls past the first-slip fielder
length outside off, comes forward and defends
length outside off, left alone by Masakadza, hardly any seam movement now
back of length outside off, some extra bounce there, Masakadza adjusts and defends it on the off side
straying on middle and leg this time, tucked away towards square leg
keeps low, on the second bounce to the keeper. Was length ball angled across, left alone by the batsman
length ball, once again outside off and shouldered arms
length ball, much closer to the batsman this time who comes forward and blocks
length ball outside off, comes forward and blocks
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot towards short cover, a fumble there but no run taken
fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards point
beats the inside edge, but it was angling down the leg side. Was a length ball which kept coming in
fuller outside off and defended on the front foot
length ball, around off and spinning back. The batsman looks to defend but misses and gets hit on the pads
fuller on the stumps, driven towards mid-on
length ball, looks to lap it away but misses

fuller down the leg side, and this time executes the lap sweep well, a single to fine leg
length outside off, stays beside the line and defends it on the off side
length ball, just outside off, comes forward and defends

bouncer this time, but doesn't bounce as much as Chari expected. Gets hit on the shoulder as he looks to defend
another short ball, but this time the line is outside off, Chari ducks and sways away
fuller outside off, left alone by Chari
length ball, in the corridor and shouldered arms once again

and gone! Taijul breaks the stubborn stand. Tosses it up outside off, forces the batsman to play at it who pushes and gets a healthy outside edge, Mehidy at first slip takes a good low catch to his right
length outside off, left alone

short and pulled away, didn't time it at all as the ball lands near vacant square leg region, the fine-leg fielder does the tidying up
length outside off, comes forward and leaves it alone
length ball, much closer to the stumps this time but the same response from the batsman
length outside off and Chari is not going to chase those

length ball but down the leg side, everyone misses as it turns further down

flighted on the stumps, defended towards silly mid-on
and Mehidy bowls a length ball down the leg side, Tiripano is happy to let that go

length ball, tight lines around off, defended close to the pad into the off side

length ball that cuts in towards off and goes into the leg side after taking the inside edge of the bat
just back of a length, angled down the leg side. Maiden to kick off the morning
angles across a length ball that's left alone
back of a length, beautifully angled across, cuts him in half as it shoots past the outside edge as he hangs back and sticks the bat out
length, pushed across, keeps the bat inside the line this time as it keeps low
full, slanted across on off, pushed to mid-off
short of good length outside off, left alone
goes around the wicket now and angles in a fuller delivery outside off, left alone
length ball on off, shuffles across and defends down the pitch

short ball that pings him on the helmet. Gets down to duck but the ball doesn't climb as much as he had anticipated and smashes bang into the side of the helmet. A protective part of the helmet from the right side comes flying off upon impact. New helmet, sure, but the team doctor's also out to check on him
good length, nips away towards off, shuffles across and defends
short of good length, holds its line outside off, left alone
short of a length, a bit of extra bounce and he sways out of the line before defending away from the body
full and straight outside off. Left alone. A hat-trick of maidens in the morning
short of good length, angled into the fifth-stump line and straightening to rip past the outside edge

back of a length outside off, defended from the crease

good length on middle, defended from the crease
length ball, jags away outside off and rolls away off the outside of the bat
short ball, this one he is able to easily get under
back of a length on off, jumps back and defends
good length, angles in from wide of off, shoulders arms
fuller of a length outside off, blocked into the off side
gets forward and pushes through the covers
full outside off and tailing away late, left alone
good length, pitching outside leg, knocked to short leg

angled in from outside off and left alone

gets forward and blocks to silly point
angles in a length ball that nips away just a tad, forcing a leave out of the batsman

lifts the bat to let this one go and it runs down to fine leg after angling in and hitting him on the hip
short of length, nudged with the angle to the right of silly point

Chari wears another blow on the helmet. Boy he's having a rough morning. Crashes into the grille as he's arching away and doesn't climb enough. The protective gear on the right comes off again. Well, not off, but it's dangling threatening to fall off. Surely got to get a new helmet now
short and wide, and he cuts it fiercely. The man at point gets his hand to it, but cannot hold on! Harsh to call it a chance -- more of a great stop!
tossed up, and he comes forward and defends
pitched a little shorter, and Chari looks to whip it on the on-side, but eventually defends it straight
straight ball, he comes forward and defends
tosses it up, and he goes on to the back foot and defends
strays a little on to the pads, and also fires it in quicker. Defended off the back foot
tossed up, and he smashes this over long-off. Well struck, and the first really convincing stroke of this morning session from a Zimbabwean batsman.
short in length, and he rocks back and punches it through the cover region
straight and he defends. Looks for a single, but it drops too close to short leg
straighter this time, and he tucks it around the corner down to the long leg fielder

wayward this time! He looks to dig it in short, but strays well down the leg side, and it misses a diving Rahim to go for four byes
straight and fast, raps him on the pads. There's a half-hearted appeal, as the bowler realises it would probably have gone down leg
outside off stump, and he shoulders arms
tossed up, and he comes forward and drives it gently
straighter this time, and he hangs back and pushes it away on the onside
straighter ball, and he comes forward and smothers the spin
well bowled! He just holds this up a little, and Chari is caught up in two minds. Eventually plays it well, with soft hands
comes forward and defends a straight one
straight, and he hangs back and defends away on the on-side. Seemed to keep a bit low, this
ooh, a good ball! Bowled from wide of the crease and slanted in, the batsman lets it go, and it doesn't go too far of the off stump
straighter and a littler shorter. He defends this away on the onside.
this has some bite in it. Straight and quick, and takes the inside edge of Taylor's bat as he looks to defend, and trickles down towards the fine leg fielder
short, and swivel-pulled by Chari. Good counter-offensive this time from Chari. Completely in control, especially with a square-leg fielder in position.
great response from the bowler! Quick and full, and he just about digs it out.
comes forward and defends a straight ball
straight ball, driven on the offside
pitched on leg, and he comes forward and defends
looks for the sweep, and misses. There's an appeal, but that must have pitched on the fifth stump!
shorter and this time he goes back and cuts. Doesn't get a hold of it, but does ping the silly point fielder on his leg
this time the sweep is effective. The ball was well outside leg, and he does well to get his body behind the ball before going into the stroke.
short and he weaves out of the way. The line is far too wide outside off
dug in short, and this time he looks for a glance and plays it uppishly. Just bounces ahead of the man at leg gully
comes in and raps him on the pad. The bowler seems keen on a review, but the senior players seem to believe it might have slid down the leg side

short, and he goes back and defends. Ahmed has been brisk, but his length has been a short, and when he has pitched it up, he has strayed a bit down the pads. Needs to get both right to be a threat here
straight, but going towards the leg stump again. Taylor defends it comfortably
wide, but keeps a bit low. Taylor looks for the drive, but under-edges it back down the pitch
comes forward and defends a straight ball

another good shot! This time he goes inside out. He's picking the length early, and then using whatever little room is on offer to play shots over the infielders
comes forward and defends a straight ball
another straight lofted shot, and a good way to bring up FIFTY! Gritty innings, considering he had to graft through yesterday and this morning

goes on to the back foot and defends

sharp turn, but slow, and he goes back and plays this away comfortably
a bit of drift away, and he goes back and plays it off the pitch, away to the offside
comes forward and defends

this is fired in straight, and he goes back and defends. Looks in control, especially against Taijul
short and straight, and he looks for the cut. Doesn't middle it
comes forward and defends
drives on the up, past the man at silly point, but a good diving stop at covers
comes forward and defends a ball pitched outside off
sweeps, and picks it from outside off. The fielder down at long leg is Mustafizur, who stops it with his left boot, and gets some help from a teammate
goes back and defends a ball turning from off to middle

fuller ball, and he looks for the reverse sweep. It hits him on the full, and there's a half-appeal. Are they going to refer this? Probably not, because the ball may have taken a bit of glove along the way
comes forward and defends a straight ball

a conventional sweep this time, and it is hit like a rocket! Picks the length early, and down on one knee, he has enough time on this pitch to take it well beyond the man at the square leg fence. Terrific shot
comes forward and defends
outside off, and he defneds it off the front foot
defends off the front foot again

comes forward and adjusts late to defend
this time he comes a step down the wicket and drives it down to long-off. That's what positive batting can do -- open up the field and create new scoring avenues
comes forward and defends
tossed up a bit more, but he comes forward and smothers the spin
is that a drop? It's a shorter ball, and he was looking for a glance, and it nearly carries to Mahmudullah. Did it come off bat or pad?

another ball that is straighter, and it loops up what looks like body to the short leg fielder. Bangladesh have reviewed this, though. The ball definitely hits the pad first, and as Chari looks for evasive action, does it just take the glove? Oh yes, the TV replays and UltraEdge suggest that there's just a little hint of glove along the way Big wicket this!
goes back and defends this
straighter ball, that he looks to drive, but can only poke tentatively down the wicket
goes back and defends this off the back foot
tossed up, and he plays it down the ground with soft hands
looks to drive it straight, as Taijul comes over the wicket
outside off, and keeps low. He misses the cut, as the ball goes under his bat
takes this on the full and drives it down the onside
fired in quicker, and again he looks to defend and it takes part of the inner edge as it trickles down to fine leg
defends off the front foot
plays it off the front foot

comes forward this time and defends
bowled wide of the crease, and he defends.
length ball, stays back and turns it into the leg side

big turn, big bounce, from off-stump and squares him up and leaves him beaten

tucked through midwicket

outside off, driven to the off side

comes forward and defends
overpitched outside off, driven hard and crisply to cover, but straight to the fielder there
carves a drive away but again finds the fielder, this time at extra cover

gets an inside edge into the pad as he presses forward to defend. The ball lobs in the air but lands before short leg can get to it
good length, subtle angle across, nearly shaves the outside edge as he plays at it

stays back and punches this back of a length delivery to point

gets an inside edge to the on side as he presses forward to defend
drives a fuller one to extra cover

short, but straying down leg. Not for the first time today, but this time Rahim does well, diving away to his left, to get some glove to it
short and cutting back into him. He defends it off the back foot.
short and cutting back in again. Taylor is on the hop as the ball takes the inside edge and strikes his thigh. He seems wary of the fielder at short leg too

fuller, and down the leg side. Taylor flicks it in the air, and not far from the leg slip/gully fieldsman. Diving away to his left, but cannot get a hand to it
down the leg side and he tries to tuck it away towards fine leg. It takes his pads along the way
short and he swats it away off the backfoot through the midwicket region. Too short in length on a pitch of this slow nature

length ball outside off stump, and he goes back and defends
